import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import './PostItem.css' // redux import { connect } from 'react-redux' // components import Moment from 'react-moment' const PostItem = ({ post, showActions }) => { const { _id, text, name, avatar, likes, comments, date } = post return (

{name}

Posted on {date}

{text}

) } PostItem.defaultProps = { showActions: true } PostItem.propTypes = { post: PropTypes.object.isRequired, } export default PostItem
